isis.stitle: ALTERNATOR: DELCO-REMY CS-130 SERIES - TROUBLESHOOTING - AMPERAGE TEST

step1.para: With engine running at a moderate speed (rpm), turn carbon pile on and adjust to obtain maximum amperage output without allowing voltage on the battery load test voltmeter to drop below 13 volts. Record maximum ampere output on battery load test ammeter.
Maximum ampere output should be within 15 amps of output rating stamped next to part number on alternator drive end frame, or as listed in SPECIFICATIONS.
If alternator speed was 5000 rpm or higher and output was not within 15 amps of rating, replace alternator.
If reading is within 15 amps of rating and voltage is less than 15 volts, alternator is good.
